resources.string: Sehat is an application which provides real- time stats and updates related to COVID19, built by three high school students in India.
The news articles are sourced from The Guardian.
The global statistics related to COVID19 are sourced from the W.H.O, John Hopkins University and Covid19 India.
Stay at home, especially if you feel unwell. Only go outside for essential activities, like buying groceries or seeing a doctor when you are unwell.
Wash your hands often with soap and water or any other alcohol-based hand rub.
Always cover your mouth and nose with your elbow or a tissue while coughing.
Wear a face mask while going outside for essential activities and maintain a distance from anyone who is coughing.
Avoid unnecessary interactions with other people and continue working from home.
